data.text: @BillyMcWillia12 He’s so stupid, he makes Lauren Boebert look like a rocket scientist…
@BillyMcWillia12 Seems to me that every time he tweets it's misinformation of some kind 🤷
@BillyMcWillia12 Looks like he removed it. Hopefully.

@BillyMcWillia12 I’ve been using the “f” word a lot today.  I fully intend to be censored by @Twitter .  But I’m ok with that.  We should all be outraged, right now.  If we’re not ~ then we are all really shitty fucking human beings. 😕
@BillyMcWillia12 He is such a shitty, fucking human being. 😕
@LaurelYost @BillyMcWillia12 I did it a few months ago and we have yet to go a day where our "leadership" hasn't embarrassed us in some way https://t.co/LGImAD7FNc
@balondie @BillyMcWillia12 Never saw that. But, Hell, yes!
@balondie @souix55 @MeAndMyDogToo @BillyMcWillia12 @for_sweeney Agree. He needs to be visible and heard often. @for_sweeney

@DwayneRude1 @souix55 @MeAndMyDogToo @BillyMcWillia12 @for_sweeney But why not be vocal now? Get out there and start getting things done? Why is it that the Dems in this state seem to wait and then fight an uphill battle their whole campaign?
@balondie @souix55 @MeAndMyDogToo @BillyMcWillia12 @for_sweeney will become more active very soon...
